rl.photoviewer.controller

Class PVController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • rl.photoviewer.controller.PVController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener, Controller

    public class PVController
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
implements Controller
    Controller of the photo viewer. It translates view events into model method calls. The slide show control thread is also included.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde
